## Install of sf & tidyverse

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show The Code"
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse, funModeling)
```

## Importing Geospatial

```{r}
geoNGA <- st_read("data/geospatial/",
                  layer = "geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM2") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 26392)
```
